metadata.synopsis: The character comments on picking up an unfinished teddy bear toy in the toymaker's house basement.
metadata.how_to_trigger: BGO_Main_A, Merchant's House basement, 338; 0; -980Pick up a teddy bear toy

0.speaker: Player
0.text: I'm sure this toy'll be finished soon if they bear with it.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: These bears are like the ones in the barn - let's hope they don't explode.
